title: The Bunnyhop, Episode 4: Kasia Niewiadoma and Hayley Simmonds
content:
The Bunnyhop, Episode 4: Kasia Niewiadoma and Hayley Simmonds

For episode 4 of The Bunnyhop powered by Cannondale Amy Jones and Katie Colclough join Rebecca Carlton in the studio to talk La Course by the Tour de France and the 2022 Tour de France Femmes avec Zwift.

Rebecca joins Hayley Simmonds of CAMS-Basso for a ride around Cambridge and Kasia Niewiadoma is featured as this episode’s ‘Something About Me’.

Read More
author: Abby Mickey
